慯字的基本解释

慯
shāng
古同“伤”，忧伤；悲痛。

慯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shāng］
［《廣韻》式羊切，平陽，書。］
［《廣韻》式亮切，去漾，書。］
忧伤，哀痛。

慯字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　慯； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页400第01
【唐韻】式亮切【集韻】尸亮切，?音餉。【說文】憂也。从心，殤省聲。　又【廣韻】式羊切【集韻】尸羊切，?音商。【類篇】痛也。　【集韻】亦作?。通作傷。

慯字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
慯字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Squat
shāng
Gu Tong is "wounded", sad; grief.
Squat
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shāng］
["Guangyun" style sheep cut, Pingyang, book. ]
["Guangyun" style bright cut, go to Yang, book. ]
Sadness, sorrow.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　慯; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 400 No. 01
[Tang Yun] style bright cut [Ji Yun] corpse bright cut,? Sound rates. [Said Wen] Worry too. From the heart, save the sound.　[Guangyun] style sheep cut [Jiyun] corpse sheep cut, sound quotient. 【Classes】It hurts too.　【Jiyun】also made?. Pass injury.
